name: Yes Serena
description:
Are Your employees lazy?

Are they unable to work for more than 10 hours without breaks?

Butsubun™ presents Serena. An intelligent AI assistant with builtin Home AI Helper Application (HAHA™) that will grade Your employees lives and will help them improve themselves and make Your company more prosperous! 

Features
  • Get ordered around by a robot!
  • Clean Your room!
  • Cut croissants!
  • Urinate!
  • Browse memes!
  • 2 pieces of art by @synth.p.u.s.s.y and one by @sewiggler
  • Music by myself
Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look around
  • LMB - Interact/Place
  • RMB - Throw
  • CTRL - Crouch
Disclaimer

This game contains some blood. The linux build hasn't been tested and the macOS build was only tested once, so if any issues arise, please contact me.

This game prototype was created at FAMU for their game design course.

Originally this project was supposed to humorously reflect current trends of smart homes and appliances. In the end it turned out a bit more nihilistic.

This project took about 6 months to make, but it probably took like 5 years of my life.
